actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends  the target is restrained and the snake cant constrict a different target.

name: Copper Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 17

special_abilities.name: Flow Within the Mountain
special_abilities.desc: The dragon has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in mountainous regions.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 20-foot-long  5-foot wide-line. Each creature in the area makes a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw  taking 13 (3d8) acid damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

actions.name: Slowing Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales toxic gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw  becoming slowed for 1 minute on a failure. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on itself on a success.

special_abilities.name: Aquatic
special_abilities.desc: The coralfish can only breathe underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage  and the target makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw against being petrified. On a failure  the target is restrained as it begins to turn to a brightly colored statue. A lesser restoration spell ends this effect. If still restrained  the creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success  the effect ends. On a failure  the creature is petrified for 24 hours.

reactions.name: Frenzy (1/Day)
reactions.desc: When attacked by a creature it can see within 20 feet, the cockatrice moves up to half its Speed and makes a bite attack against that creature.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The unicorn attacks once with its hooves and once with its horn.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Horn
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage. If the target is a creature and the unicorn moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack  the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and makes a DC 16 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

actions.name: Trample
actions.desc: The unicorn attacks a prone creature with its hooves.

actions.name: Darkness Aura (1/Day)
actions.desc: A 15-foot radius area of magical darkness emanates from the unicorn  spreading around corners and moving with it. Darkvision and natural light cant penetrate it. If the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a 2nd-level spell or lower  the spell creating the light is dispelled. The darkness aura lasts for 10 minutes or until the unicorn takes damage. The aura doesnt hinder the unicorns sight.

actions.name: Grant Boon (3/Day)
actions.desc: The unicorn touches a willing creature  including itself  with its horn and grants one of the following boons:

actions.name: Healing: The creature magically regains 21 (6d6) hit points
actions.desc: It is cured of all diseases  and poisons affecting it are neutralized.

actions.name: Luck: During the next 24 hours, the creature can roll a d12 and add the result to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw after seeing the result
Protection: A glowing mote of light orbits the creatures head
actions.desc: The mote lasts 24 hours. When the creature fails a saving throw  it can use its reaction to expend the mote and succeed on the saving throw.

actions.name: Resolution: The creature is immune to being charmed or frightened for 24 hours

special_abilities.name: Alchemy Schooling
special_abilities.desc: The alchemist gains their proficiency bonus and an expertise die (+1d6) on checks made with alchemists supplies.

special_abilities.name: Crafting
special_abilities.desc: So long as the alchemist has the required components and equipment, they are able to craft potions of up to legendary rarity and other magic items of up to very rare rarity.

special_abilities.name: Potion Crafter
special_abilities.desc: The alchemist has the following potions on hand:

special_abilities.name: Potion of climbing: For 1 hour, the drinker gains a climb speed equal to its Speed and has advantage on Athletics checks made to climb
Potion of greater healing (3): Restores 14 (4d4 + 4) hit points
Potion of superior healing: Restores 28 (8d4 + 8) hit points
Potion of water breathing: For 1 hour, the drinker can breathe underwater

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The alchemist attacks twice with their dagger.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit  reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft.  one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Bomb (3/Day)
actions.desc: The alchemist lobs a bomb at a point they can see within 80 feet. Upon impact  the bomb explodes in a 10-foot radius. Creatures in the area make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw  taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Alter Bomb
bonus_actions.desc: The alchemist quickly swaps reagents to change the damage dealt by their next bomb to acid, cold, lightning, poison, or thunder.

bonus_actions.name: Potion
bonus_actions.desc: The alchemist drinks or administers a potion.

reactions.name: Desperate Drink (1/Day
reactions.desc: When the alchemist is dealt damage, they drink a potion.

reactions.name: A typical cosmopolitan alchemist employs a trusted underling

name: Couatl
damage_resistances: psychic, radiant; damage from nonmagical weapons

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The couatls spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, 3/day each: create food and water, detect thoughts, lesser restoration, 1/day each: dream, greater restoration, scrying

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends  the target is restrained  the couatl cant constrict other targets  and the couatl has advantage on attacks against the target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage  and the target makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  it is poisoned for 24 hours. The target is unconscious until the poisoned condition ends or a creature uses an action to shake the target awake.

actions.name: Heal (1/Day)
actions.desc: The couatl touches a creature  magically healing 20 hit points of damage and ending the poisoned condition on that creature.

actions.name: Shapeshift
actions.desc: The couatl magically changes its form to resemble that of a humanoid or beast  or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. If its form is humanoid  it is equipped with clothing and a weapon. While shapeshifted  its statistics are the same except that it cant use Constrict and Shielding Wing and it may gain a swim speed of 60 or lose its fly speed if appropriate to its new form. If its a beast  it can use its bite attack. If its a humanoid  it may make a weapon attack  which functions identically to its bite attack.

reactions.name: Shielding Wing
reactions.desc: When the couatl or a creature within 5 feet is attacked, the couatl can interpose a wing and impose disadvantage on the attack.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The hag can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The hags innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: dancing lights, disguise self, invisibility, minor illusion, 1/day: geas

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hag attacks twice with its claws and then uses Hex if not in beast form.

actions.name: Beast Form
actions.desc: The hag magically transforms into a Large or smaller beast or back into its true form. While in beast form  it retains its game statistics  cant cast spells  cant use Hex  and cant speak. The hags Speed increases by 10 feet  and when appropriate to its beast form it gains a climb  fly  or swim speed of 40 feet. Any equipment the hag is wearing or wielding merges into its new form.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Hex (Gaze)
actions.desc: A creature within 60 feet that is not already under a hags hex makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. A creature under an obligation to the hag automatically fails this saving throw. On a failed saving throw  the target is cursed with a magical hex that lasts 30 days. The curse ends early if the target suffers harm from the hag or if the hag ends it as an action. Roll 1d4:
Charm Hex. The target is charmed by the hag.
Fear Hex. The target is frightened of the hag.
Ill Fortune Hex. The hag magically divines the targets activities. Whenever the target attempts a long-duration task such as a craft or downtime activity  the hag can cause the activity to fail.
Sleep Hex. The target falls unconscious. The curse ends early if the target takes damage or if a creature uses an action to shake it awake.

actions.name: Invisibility (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration)
actions.desc: The hag is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the hag attacks  uses Hex  or casts a spell.

special_abilities.name: Curse
special_abilities.desc: A creature touched by the hags claws is magically cursed for 30 days. While under this curse, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls made against the hag.

special_abilities.name: Evil
special_abilities.desc: The hag radiates an Evil aura.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one creature. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage  and the target is subject to the hags Curse trait.

actions.name: Sleep Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one creature. Hit: The target falls asleep for 4 hours or until it takes damage or is shaken awake. Once the hag successfully hits a target  it cant make this attack again until it finishes a long rest.

actions.name: Shapeshift
actions.desc: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid. Equipment it is carrying isnt transformed. It retains its claws in any form. It has no true form and remains in its current form when it dies.

actions.name: Planar Travel (3/Day)
actions.desc: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane  or vice versa. Alternatively  the hag is magically transported to the Material Plane  Hell  or the Abyss  arriving within 10 miles of its desired destination.

actions.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Day)
actions.desc: While on the Ethereal Plane  the hag magically touches a sleeping creature that is under the night hags Curse and is not protected by a magic circle or protection from evil and good spell or similar magic. As long as the touch persists  the target has terrible nightmares. If the nightmares last for 1 hour  the target gains no benefit from the rest  and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 (1d10) until the curse ends. If this effect reduces the targets hit points maximum to 0  the target dies and the hag captures its soul. The reduction to the targets hit point maximum lasts until removed by greater restoration or similar magic.

bonus_actions.name: Fragmentary Dream
bonus_actions.desc: The hag creates a terrifying illusion visible only to one creature that it can see within 120 feet. The creature makes a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. It takes 22 (4d10) psychic damage and becomes frightened until the end of its turn on a failure, or takes half damage on a success.

reactions.name: Steal Magic (3/Day)
reactions.desc: When a creature the hag can see within 60 feet casts a spell using a 3rd-level or lower spell slot, the hag attempts to steal its power. The caster makes a DC 14 saving throw using its spellcasting ability. On a failure, the spell fails, and the hag gains 5 (1d10) temporary hit points per level of the spell slot used.

reactions.name: Fragmentary Dream
reactions.desc: The hag creates a terrifying illusion visible only to one creature that it can see within 120 feet. The creature makes a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. It takes 22 (4d10) psychic damage and becomes frightened until the end of its turn on a failure, or takes half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The hag can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Curse
special_abilities.desc: A creature that makes a bargain with the hag is magically cursed for 30 days. While it is cursed, the target automatically fails saving throws against the hags scrying and geas spells, and the hag can cast control weather centered on the creature.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The hags innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: dancing lights, disguise self, 1/day: control weather, geas, scrying

actions.name: Death Glare (Gaze)
actions.desc: One frightened creature within 30 feet makes a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw  the creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success  the creature takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hag attacks twice with its claws.

actions.name: Lightning Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: An 80-foot-long  5-foot-wide lightning bolt springs from the hags extended claw. Each creature in the area makes a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw  taking 21 (6d6) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Horrific Transformation
bonus_actions.desc: The hag briefly takes on a terrifying form or reveals its true form. Each creature within 30 feet that can see the hag makes a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. A creature under the hags curse automatically fails this saving throw. On a failure, the creature is frightened until the end of its next turn. If a creatures saving throw is successful, it is immune to the hags Horrific Transformation for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Curse
special_abilities.desc: A creature that accepts a gift from the hag is magically cursed for 30 days. While it is cursed, the target automatically fails saving throws against the hags charm person, geas, and scrying spells, and the hag can cast control weather centered on the creature.

special_abilities.name: Icy Travel
special_abilities.desc: The hag is not hindered by cold weather, icy surfaces, snow, wind, or storms. Additionally, the hag and her allies leave no trace when walking on snow or ice.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The hags innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: charm person, dancing lights, invisibility, minor illusion, passwall (ice only), 1/day: control weather (extreme cold), geas, scrying, 1/day each: cone of cold, wall of ice

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hag attacks with its claws and uses Ice Bolt.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Ice Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit  range 60 ft.  one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) cold damage  and the target makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. A creature under the hags curse automatically fails this saving throw. On a failure  the creature is restrained as it begins to turn to ice. At the end of the creatures next turn  the creature repeats the saving throw. On a success  the effect ends. On a failure  the creature is petrified into ice. This petrification can be removed with greater restoration or similar magic.

actions.name: Shapeshift
actions.desc: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Equipment it is carrying isnt transformed. It retains a streak of white hair in any form. It returns to its true form if it dies.

actions.name: Invisibility (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration)
actions.desc: The hag is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the hag attacks or casts a spell.

actions.name: Cone of Cold (5th-Level; V, S)
actions.desc: Frost blasts from the hag in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw  taking 36 (8d8) cold damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

actions.name: Wall of Ice (6th-level; V, S, Concentration)
actions.desc: The hag magically creates a wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 120 feet. The wall is flat  1 foot thick  and can be up to 50 feet long and 20 feet high. The wall lasts for 10 minutes. Each 10-foot section has AC 12  30 hit points  vulnerability to fire damage  and immunity to cold  poison  and psychic damage. Destroying a 10-foot section of wall leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the section occupied. A creature moving through the sheet of frigid air for the first time on a turn makes a Constitution saving throw  taking 17 (5d6) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

actions.name: If the wall enters a creatures space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (hags choice)
actions.desc: The creature then makes a Dexterity saving throw  taking 35 (10d6) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

reactions.name: Ice Shield
reactions.desc: The hag adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it made by a creature it can see. If the attack misses, the attacker takes 14 (4d6) cold damage.

special_abilities.desc: The crab can breathe air and water.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.desc: The boss targets a creature within 30 feet that can see or hear them. For 1 minute or until the boss threatens a different target  the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage whenever the boss hits it with a weapon attack.

reactions.name: Command Bodyguard
reactions.desc: When the boss would be hit by an attack, they command an ally within 5 feet to use its reaction to switch places with the boss. The ally is hit by the attack instead of the boss.

reactions.name: Offhand Dagger
reactions.desc: When missed by an attack, the boss makes a dagger attack.

reactions.name: A crime boss has risen to the top of a criminal gang or guild
reactions.desc: Theyre tough in a fight but too smart to do their own dirty work unless absolutely necessary.

name: Crusher
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

actions.desc: The crusher moves up to its Speed in a straight line. While doing so  it can attempt to enter Large or smaller creatures spaces. Whenever the crusher attempts to enter a creatures space  the creature makes a DC 17 Dexterity or Strength saving throw (the creatures choice). If the creature succeeds at a Strength saving throw  the crushers movement ends for the turn. If the creature succeeds at a Dexterity saving throw  the creature may use its reaction  if available  to move up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. The first time on the crushers turn that it enters a creatures space  the creature is knocked prone and takes 50 (10d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. A creature is prone while in the crushers space.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the crusher moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack  the attack deals an extra 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage.

 Cantrips (at will): light

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). If the darkmantle made the attack with advantage  it attaches to the targets head  and the target is blinded and cant breathe. While grappling  the darkmantle can only attack the grappled creature but has advantage on its attack roll. The darkmantles speed becomes 0  and it moves with its target.

name: Dead Mans Fingers
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, fatigue, frightened, prone, restrained, stunned
senses: blindsight 90 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 11

special_abilities.name: Ethereal and Material
special_abilities.desc: The dead mans fingers lives simultaneously on the Ethereal and Material Planes. Its senses extend into both planes, and it can touch and be touched by creatures on both planes.

special_abilities.name: Ethereal Shift
special_abilities.desc: When a creature on the Material Plane touches the dead mans fingers or hits it with a melee attack, the creature is magically transported to the Ethereal Plane. The creature can see and hear into both the Ethereal and Material Plane but is unaffected by creatures and objects on the Material Plane. It can be seen as a ghostly form by creatures on the Material Plane. It can move in any direction, with each foot of movement up or down costing 2 feet of movement.

special_abilities.name: If the creature is still on the Ethereal Plane when the dead mans fingers dies, the creature returns to the Material Plane
special_abilities.desc: If this would cause a creature to appear in a space occupied by a solid object or creature, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 10 (3d6) force damage.

special_abilities.name: Flammable
special_abilities.desc: After taking fire damage, the dead mans fingers catches fire and takes ongoing 11 (2d10) fire damage if it isnt already suffering ongoing fire damage. It can spend an action or bonus action to extinguish this fire.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dead mans fingers makes two tendril attacks.

actions.name: Tendril (Ethereal or Material Plane)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit  reach 20 ft.  one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage. A target on the Material Plane is subject to the Ethereal Shift trait.

actions.name: Ethereal Spores (While Bloodied, Ethereal Plane Only)
actions.desc: Each creature within 30 feet makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw  taking 31 (9d6) necrotic damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies. If a creature killed by this attack remains on the Ethereal Plane for 24 hours  its corpse disintegrates  and a new dead mans fingers sprouts from its place.

bonus_actions.name: Telekinetic Pull (Ethereal or Material Plane)
bonus_actions.desc: One creature within 90 feet makes a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is magically pulled up to 60 feet straight towards the dead mans fingers.

special_abilities.name: Two Heads
special_abilities.desc: The death dog has advantage on Perception checks and on saving throws made to resist being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious, and it cant be flanked.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The death dog attacks twice with its bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature  it makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  it becomes infected with a disease. Until this disease is cured  the target is poisoned. While diseased  the target makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw every 24 hours  reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure and ending the disease on a success. This hit point maximum reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

special_abilities.name: Deep Dwarf Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against illusions and to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

special_abilities.name: Deep Dwarf Magic
special_abilities.desc: The deep dwarf can innately cast enlarge/reduce (self only, enlarge only) and invisibility (self only) once per long rest without using material components, using Intelligence for their spellcasting ability.

actions.name: War Pick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage  or 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage if within 5 feet of an ally that is not incapacitated  plus 2 (1d4) damage when Enlarged.

actions.name: Enlarge (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration)
actions.desc: The soldier and their equipment grow to Large size for 1 minute. They have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws  and their attacks deal an extra 2 (1d4) damage (included in their War Pick attack).

actions.name: Invisibility (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration)
actions.desc: The soldier is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the soldier attacks or casts a spell.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  range 100/400 ft.  one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Tactical Movement
bonus_actions.desc: Until the end of the soldiers turn, their Speed is halved and their movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks.

bonus_actions.name: Deep dwarves march grimly to battle from huge underground cities

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The scout has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or sight.

special_abilities.name: Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The scout has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

special_abilities.name: Deep Gnome Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The scout has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

special_abilities.name: Deep Gnome Magic
special_abilities.desc: The deep gnome can innately cast blindness/deafness (blindness only), disguise self, and nondetection once per long rest without using material components, using Intelligence for their spellcasting ability.

actions.name: War Pick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Blindness (2nd-Level; V)
actions.desc: A creature within 30 feet makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  the target is blinded for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on a success.

actions.name: Far underground, deep gnomes use stealth to survive amidst warlike deep dwarves and imperious shadow elves
actions.desc: Deep gnome scouts hunt and forage  search for gems  and set ambushes for enemies who approach their settlements.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The deer has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

actions.name: Headbutt
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

name: Demilich
damage_immunities: necrotic, poison, psychic; damage from nonmagical weapons
condition_immunities: charmed, deafened, fatigue, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but doesnt speak

special_abilities.name: Avoidance
special_abilities.desc: If the demilich makes a saving throw against an effect that deals half damage on a success, it takes no damage on a success and half damage on a failure.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, one of the five tiny warding gems set on its forehead or teeth shatters.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: A demilich doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

actions.name: Devour Soul
actions.desc: The demilich targets one creature within 120 feet  forcing it to make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a success  or if all the large soul gems on the demilichs skull are occupied  the creature takes 40 necrotic damage  and the demilich regains the same number of hit points. If the target fails its saving throw and there is at least one unoccupied soul gem on the demilichs skull  the demilich regains 40 hit points  and the target dies instantly. Its soul is trapped in a soul gem on the demilichs skull  visible as a tiny  creature-shaped mote of light. While its soul is trapped  a creature cant be restored to life by any means. A soul that remains in a soul gem for 30 days is destroyed forever. If the demilich is defeated and a soul gem crushed  the creature is restored to life if its body is within 100 miles. A creature that succeeds on a saving throw against this effect is immune to it for 24 hours.

actions.name: A demilich begins combat with one or two empty soul gems

legendary_actions.name: The demilich can take 3 legendary actions
legendary_actions.desc: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. The demilich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Cranial Transposition
legendary_actions.desc: The dust surrounding the demilich falls to the ground. The demilich and a nonmagical, unattended skull within 30 teleport, switching places. Until the demilich moves or attacks, it is indistinguishable from a nonmagical skull, and the dust composing the demilichs wraithlike body doesnt reform around it.

legendary_actions.name: Dust Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dust of the demilichs body swirls in a 30-foot radius around the demilich. Each creature in the area makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 21 (6d6) necrotic damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn. The demilich then moves up to its speed.

legendary_actions.name: Ringing Laugh (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature within 60 feet that can hear the demilich makes a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature is frightened until the end of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Telekinesis
legendary_actions.desc: The demilich targets a Huge or smaller creature or an object weighing up to 1,000 pounds within 60 feet. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw. Otherwise, the demilich moves the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including up. If another creature or object stops the targets movement, both take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage. At the end of this movement, the target falls if it is still in the air, taking falling damage as normal.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Aligned
special_abilities.desc: An angel radiates a Lawful aura. Most angels also radiate a Good aura, and a few radiate Evil.

special_abilities.name: Celestial Dissolution
special_abilities.desc: When an angel dies, its body and equipment dissolve into motes of light.

special_abilities.name: Detect Alignment
special_abilities.desc: An angel knows the alignment, if any, of each creature within 30 feet that it can see.

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: An angel doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The deva makes two attacks.

actions.name: Celestial Hammer (Deva Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 17 (5d6) radiant damage. On a hit  the target cant make opportunity attacks against the deva until the beginning of the targets next turn.

actions.name: Divine Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit  range 60 ft.  one target. Hit: 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Energy (1/Day)
actions.desc: The deva touches a creature other than itself. If the target is unwilling  the deva makes an attack roll with a +8 bonus. The deva can choose to magically heal 60 hit points of damage and end any blindness  curse  deafness  disease  or poison on the target. Alternatively  the deva can choose to deal 60 radiant damage to the target.

actions.name: Change Form
actions.desc: The deva magically transforms into a beast or humanoid or back into its true form. It retains its deva statistics  including speech and telepathy  except that it has the size  movement modes  and traits of its new form.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The diplodocus makes a stomp attack and a tail attack against two different targets.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit  reach 15 ft.  one target. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature  it is pushed 10 feet away from the diplodocus and knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The centipede can climb even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage and the target makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  the target takes 10 (3d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. The target is paralyzed while poisoned in this way. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on a success.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tyrannosaurus makes a bite attack and a tail attack against two different targets.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit  reach 10 ft.  one target. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature  it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends  the tyrannosaurus cant bite a different creature and it has advantage on bite attacks against the grappled creature.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit  reach 10 ft.  one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolfs allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature  it makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The rat has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The giant rat has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the rats allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage. Giant rats who dwell in sewers and filth can carry debilitating disease. A creature bitten by a diseased giant rat makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or it becomes infected with sewer plague.

name: Divi
senses: darkvision 120 ft., tremorsense 30 ft., passive Perception 16

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: The divi can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The divis innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self (can assume Medium or Large form), detect magic, stone shape, 3/day each: creation, move earth, passwall, tongues, 1/day each: conjure elemental (earth elemental only), plane shift (to Elemental Plane of Earth only)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The divi makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Crushing Hand
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends  the divi cant use Crushing Hand on another target and has advantage on Crushing Hand attacks against this target  and the target cant breathe.

actions.name: Stone Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit  reach 10 ft.  one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Quake (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Amid deafening rumbling  the ground shakes in a 10-foot radius around a point on an earth or stone surface within 90 feet. The area becomes difficult terrain. Each non-elemental creature in the area makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw  taking 24 (7d6) thunder damage and falling prone on a failure or taking half damage on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Stone Wall (1/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: A permanent stone wall magically rises from an earth or stone surface within 60 feet. The wall is 6 inches thick and can be up to 20 feet high and 30 feet long. If it appears in a creatures space, the creature can choose which side of the wall to move to. Each 10-foot-by-10-foot section of the wall is an object with AC 18 and 30 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The djinni makes three scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit  range 90 ft.  one target. Hit: 35 (10d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Scimitar Sweep (1/Day, Giant Form Only)
actions.desc: The djinn makes a scimitar attack against each creature of its choice within its reach.

bonus_actions.name: Giant Form (1/Day
bonus_actions.desc: The djinni magically becomes a Huge, semi-substantial creature of billowing cloud. In this form, it gains resistance to nonmagical damage, and its scimitar attacks gain a reach of 10 feet. The effect ends after 1 minute, when the djinni is incapacitated, or if the djinn becomes bloodied.

bonus_actions.name: Whirlwind (1/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: A magical, 5-foot-wide, 30-foot-tall whirlwind appears in a space the djinni can see within 60 feet. The whirlwind may appear in another creatures space. If the whirlwind appears in another creatures space, or when it enters a creatures space for the first time on a turn, the creature makes a DC 18 Strength check, becoming restrained by the whirlwind on a failure. The whirlwind may restrain one creature at a time. A creature within 5 feet of the whirlwind (including the restrained creature) can use an action to make a DC 18 Strength check, freeing the restrained creature on a success. A freed creature can move to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the whirlwind.

bonus_actions.name: As a bonus action
bonus_actions.desc: The whirlwind disappears if the djinni loses sight of it, if the djinni dies or is incapacitated, or if the djinni dismisses it as an action.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The djinnis innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). actions.name: Precise Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is surprised  it takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage.

bonus_actions.name: Shapeshift
bonus_actions.desc: The doppelganger changes its form to that of any Small or Medium humanoid creature it has seen before, or back into its true form. While shapeshifted, its statistics are the same. Any equipment is not transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

bonus_actions.name: Read Thoughts
bonus_actions.desc: The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet that it can see. Until the end of its turn, it has advantage on attack rolls and on Deception, Insight, Intimidation, and Persuasion checks against the creature.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Fanatic
special_abilities.desc: The cult fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

special_abilities.name: Immunity
special_abilities.desc: A dragon cultist is immune to one damage type dealt by their draconic masters breath weapon.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The cult fanatic is a 4th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12
 +4 to hit with spell attacks). They have the following cleric spells prepared:
 Cantrips (at will): light
 sacred flame
 thaumaturgy
 1st-level (4 slots): ceremony
 command
 detect evil and good
 inflict wounds
 2nd-level (3 slots): blindness/deafness
 hold person

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip; V, S)
actions.desc: One creature the cult fanatic can see within 60 feet makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw  taking 4 (1d8) radiant damage on a failure. This spell ignores cover.

actions.name: Command (1st-Level; V)
actions.desc: One non-undead creature the cult fanatic can see within 60 feet that can hear and understand them makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure  the target uses its next turn to grovel (falling prone and then ending its turn).

actions.name: Inflict Wounds (1st-Level; V, S)
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one creature. Hit: 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Blindness/Deafness (2nd-Level; V)
actions.desc: One creature the cult fanatic can see within 30 feet makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  the creature is blinded or deafened (cult fanatics choice) for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on a success.

actions.name: Hold Person (2nd-Level; V, S, M, Concentration)
actions.desc: One humanoid the cult fanatic can see within 60 feet makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure  the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on a success.

actions.name: Some humanoids worship and serve a dragon
actions.desc: Dragonborn and kobolds are most likely to do so  but any humanoid can be compelled into a dragons service.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The dragon turtles spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components: 3/day each: control weather, water breathing, zone of truth

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit  reach 15 ft.  one target. Hit: 52 (7d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a creature  it is grappled (escape DC 21). Until this grapple ends  the dragon turtle cant bite a different creature  and it has advantage on bite attacks against the grappled creature.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit  reach 15 ft.  one target. Hit: 46 (6d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals double damage against objects  vehicles  and constructs.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit  reach 15 ft.  one target. Hit: 46 (6d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature  it makes a DC 21 Strength saving throw. On a failure  it is pushed 15 feet away from the dragon turtle and knocked prone.

actions.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon turtle exhales steam in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 20 Constitution saving throw  taking 52 (15d6) fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

actions.name: Lightning Storm (1/Day)
actions.desc: Hundreds of arcs of lightning crackle from the dragon turtle. Each creature within 90 feet makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw  taking 35 (10d6) lightning damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Claws
bonus_actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Retract
reactions.desc: When the dragon turtle takes 50 damage or more from a single attack or spell, it retracts its head and limbs into its shell. It immediately regains 20 hit points. While retracted, it is blinded; its Speed is 0; it cant take reactions; it has advantage on saving throws; attacks against it have disadvantage; and it has resistance to all damage. The dragon turtle stays retracted until the beginning of its next turn.

reactions.name: Tail
reactions.desc: When the dragon turtle is hit by an opportunity attack, it makes a tail attack.

reactions.name: Claws
reactions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Draconic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The warrior is resistant to one damage type dealt by their draconic masters breath weapon.

special_abilities.name: Draconic Smite
special_abilities.desc: The warriors weapon attacks deal an additional (1d6) damage of one damage type dealt by their draconic masters breath weapon.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dragonbound warriors serve a dragon by choice or compulsion
actions.desc: A dragonbound warrior typically guards their masters lair or patrols the surrounding area. Most dragonbound warriors are dragonborn or kobolds  but anyone can fall sway to a dragons majesty.

name: Drainpipe Gargoyle
damage_resistances: piercing and slashing damage from nonmagical, non-adamantine weapons

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless, the gargoyle is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: Gargoyles dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gargoyle attacks with its bite and its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage  or 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage if the gargoyle started its turn at least 20 feet above the target.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  range 20/60 ft.  one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spit (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The gargoyle spits a steam of water 5 feet wide and 30 feet long. Each creature in the area makes a DC 12 Strength saving throw  taking 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and being pushed up to 15 feet from the gargoyle on a failure. On a success  a creature takes half damage.

name: Dread Knight
languages: the languages it knew in life

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: A dread knight doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Unholy Aura
special_abilities.desc: The dread knight and allies within 30 feet have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects and against features that turn undead. Other creatures of the dread knights choice within 30 feet have disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

actions.name: Cursed Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage  and the targets hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Fire Blast (1/Day)
actions.desc: A fiery mote streaks from the dread knights finger to a point within 120 feet and blossoms into a 20-foot-radius sphere of black fire which spreads around corners. Each creature within the area makes a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw  taking 63 (18d6) fire damage on a failed saving throw or half damage on a success. This damage ignores fire resistance and treats immunity to fire damage as fire resistance.

actions.name: Ice Wall (1/Day)
actions.desc: The dread knight magically creates a wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet. The wall is flat  1 foot thick  and can be up to 50 feet long and 15 feet high. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until destroyed. Each 10-foot section has AC 12  30 hit points  vulnerability to fire damage  and immunity to cold  necrotic  poison  and psychic damage.

actions.name: If the wall enters a creatures space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (creatures choice)
actions.desc: The creature then makes a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw  taking 49 (14d6) cold damage on a successful save or half damage on a success.

actions.name: Soul Wrack (1/Day)
actions.desc: A creature within 60 feet makes a DC 16 Constitution saving throw  taking 70 (20d6) necrotic damage and falling prone on a failed save or taking half damage on a success.

actions.name: Summon Fiendish Steed (1/Day)
actions.desc: A fell nightmare or wyvern magically appears in an empty space within 5 feet. The steed follows the dread knights commands and acts on its turn. It may attack on the turn on which it is summoned. It remains until the dread knight dismisses it as an action or it is killed.

bonus_actions.name: Cursed Greatsword
bonus_actions.desc: The dread knight makes a cursed greatsword attack.

bonus_actions.name: Break Magic
bonus_actions.desc: The dread knight ends all spell effects created by a 5th-level or lower spell slot on a creature, object, or point within 30 feet.

name: Dread Knight Champion
languages: the languages it knew in life

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: A dread knight doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Unholy Aura
special_abilities.desc: The dread knight and allies within 30 feet have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects and against features that turn undead. Other creatures of the dread knights choice within 30 feet have disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

special_abilities.name: Legion
special_abilities.desc: The dread knights sword is a +3 greatsword that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls when it attacks with its cursed greatsword. A humanoid killed by damage from this sword rises the next dusk as a zombie. While attuned to the sword, the dread knight can use a bonus action to command zombies created in this way.

actions.desc: A fell nightmare or wyvern magically appears in an empty space within 5 feet. The steed follows the dread knights commands and acts on its turn. It may attack on the turn on which it is summoned. It remains until the dread knight dismisses it as an action or it is killed.

bonus_actions.name: Cursed Greatsword
bonus_actions.desc: The dread knight makes a cursed greatsword attack.

bonus_actions.name: Break Magic
bonus_actions.desc: The dread knight ends all spell effects created by a 5th-level or lower spell slot on a creature, object, or point within 30 feet.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The troll has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesnt function on its next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesnt regenerate.

special_abilities.name: Severed Limbs
special_abilities.desc: If the troll is dealt a critical hit with a slashing weapon, one of its extremities is severed. The extremity has AC 15, 10 hit points, a Speed of 10, and the trolls Regeneration trait. The troll controls the severed extremity and perceives through it with the appropriate senses (for instance, it sees through the eyes of its severed head). As a bonus action, the troll can reattach the extremity. While the troll is missing the extremity, its maximum hit points are reduced by 10. Roll d6 to determine the severed extremity:

special_abilities.name: 1-4: Arm
special_abilities.desc: If the troll has an arm, it loses an arm. It loses one of its claw attacks, and the severed arm can make a claw attack.

special_abilities.name: 5-6: Head
special_abilities.desc: If the troll has a head, it loses its head. It loses its bite attack, and the severed head can make a bite attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes two bite attacks and three claw attacks.

special_abilities.name: Chaotic Evil
special_abilities.desc: The dretch radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

special_abilities.name: Energy-Sucking Aura
special_abilities.desc: A non-demon creature that takes an action or bonus action while within 10 feet of a dretch cant take another action, bonus action, or reaction until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The drider can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Perception checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Web Walker
special_abilities.desc: The drider ignores movement restrictions imposed by webs.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drider makes a claws attack and then either a bite or longsword attack. Alternatively  it makes two longbow attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). While grappling a target  the drider cant attack a different target with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one grappled creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Longsword (wielded two-handed)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit  range 120/600 ft.  one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The bear has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Stealthy
special_abilities.desc: The drop bear has advantage on Stealth checks in forested areas.

special_abilities.name: Drop
special_abilities.desc: The drop bear takes no damage from falling 40 feet or fewer and deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits with an attack after falling at least 20 feet. A creature that takes this extra damage is knocked prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bear makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 9 (1d8+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 7 (1d4+5) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature  it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends  the bear cant attack a different target with its claws.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The druid is a 4th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12
 +4 to hit with spell attacks). They have the following druid spells prepared:
 Cantrips (at will): druidcraft
 produce flame
 shillelagh
 1st-level (4 slots): entangle
 longstrider
 speak with animals
 thunderwave
 2nd-level (3 slots): animal messenger
 barkskin

actions.name: Shillelagh (True Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft  one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) magical bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bite (Medium or Large Beast Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft  one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Beast Form
actions.desc: The druid magically transforms into a Large or smaller beast or back into their true form. While in beast form  they retain their game statistics  cant cast spells  and cant speak. The druids Speed increases by 10 feet  and when appropriate to their beast form they gain climb  fly  or swim speeds of 40 feet. Any equipment the druid is wearing or wielding merges into their new form.

actions.name: Produce Flame (Cantrip; V, S)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit  range 30 ft  one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Entangle (1st-Level; V, S, Concentration)
actions.desc: Vines erupt in a 20-foot square centered on a spot on the ground within 120 feet. The area is difficult terrain for 1 minute. Each creature in the area when the spell is cast makes a DC 12 Strength saving throw. On a failure  it is restrained by vines. A creature restrained in this way can use its action to make a Strength check (DC 12)  freeing itself on a success.

actions.name: Thunderwave (1st-Level; V, S)
actions.desc: Thunder rolls from the druid in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in the area makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  a creature takes 9 (2d8) thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet from the druid. On a success  a creature takes half damage and is not pushed.

actions.name: Some druids live in the wilderness with only the beasts and trees for companions
actions.desc: Others serve as spiritual leaders for nomads or farmers  healing the sick and praying for fortunate weather.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Nature
special_abilities.desc: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants.

special_abilities.name: Tree Stride
special_abilities.desc: Once per turn, the dryad can use 10 feet of movement to enter a living tree and emerge from another living tree within 60 feet. Both trees must be at least Large.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Entangling Plants
actions.desc: Plants magically erupt from the ground in a 20-foot radius around a point up to 120 feet from the dryad. Each creature of the dryads choice in the area makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failure  a creature is restrained for 1 minute. A creature can use its action to make a DC 12 Strength check  freeing itself or a creature within 5 feet on a success. Additionally  the area is difficult terrain for 1 minute.

actions.name: Fey Charm (3/Day)
actions.desc: A humanoid or beast within 30 feet makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure  it is magically charmed. While charmed in this way  the target regards the dryad as a trusted ally and is disposed to interpret the dryads requests and actions favorably. The creature can repeat this saving throw if the dryad or the dryads allies harm it  ending the effect on a success. Otherwise  the effect lasts 24 hours. If the creature succeeds on a saving throw against Fey Charm or the effect ends for it  it is immune to Fey Charm for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The warrior attacks twice.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Riposte
reactions.desc: When the duelist is missed by a melee attack by an attacker they can see within 5 feet, the duelist makes a rapier attack against the attacker with advantage.

special_abilities.name: Death Burst
special_abilities.desc: When the mephit dies, it explodes into dust. Each creature within 5 feet makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is blinded until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless, the mephit is indistinguishable from a pile of dirt.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: A mephit doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Blinding Breath (1/Day)
actions.desc: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of dust. Each creature in the area makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  the creature is blinded for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Sleep Sand (1/Day)
actions.desc: The closest creature within 60 feet with 20 hit points or fewer falls asleep for 1 minute. It awakens early if it takes damage or a creature uses an action to shake it awake. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight
special_abilities.desc: The eagle has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

name: Earth Dragon Wyrmling
senses: darkvision 120 ft., tremorsense 30 ft., passive Perception 14

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the dragon remains motionless within its linked area, it is indistinguishable from a natural rocky outcropping.

special_abilities.name: Essence Link
special_abilities.desc: The essence dragon is spiritually linked to a specific area or landmark. The dragon gains no benefit from a long rest when more than 1 mile away from its linked area. If the dragon dies, the area it is linked to loses its vital essence until it forms a new essence dragon, which can take centuries. When a creature first enters an area that has lost its vital essence in this way, they gain a level of fatigue and a level of strife. This fatigue and strife can be removed only by completing a long rest outside the area.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Scouring Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon breathes scouring sand and stones in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw  taking 10 (3d6) slashing damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: An elemental doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 10 ft.  one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Earths Embrace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends  the elemental cant burrow or use Earths Embrace and its slam attacks are made with advantage against the grappled target.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  range 30/90 ft.  one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The efreetis innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self (can assume Medium or Large form), detect magic, 3/day each: creation, gaseous form, major image, tongues, 1/day each: conjure elemental (fire elemental only), plane shift (to Elemental Plane of Fire only)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The efreeti makes two brass sword attacks or hurls flame twice. The efreeti can replace one attack with a kick.

actions.name: Brass Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit  reach 10 ft.  one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Kick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 11 (2d4 + 6) bludgeoning damage  and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the efreet.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit  range 120 ft.  one target. Hit: 21 (6d6) fire damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fiery Wall (1/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: An opaque wall of magical flame rises from the ground within 60 feet. The wall is 6 inches thick and can be up to 20 feet high and 30 feet long. Each creature within the wall when it appears makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature also takes 18 (4d8) fire damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The wall disappears when the efreet is killed or incapacitated, or when it uses an action to dismiss it.

special_abilities.desc: The efreetis innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self (can assume Medium or Large form), detect magic, 3/day each: creation, gaseous form, major image, tongues, 1/day each: conjure elemental (fire elemental only), plane shift (to Elemental Plane of Fire only)
